import { Nav, NavLink, NavMenu, NavBtn, NavBtnLink } from '../components/NavBar'; import {InpRadio} from '../components/InputRadio' import logoWhiteImg from '../assets/images/telzir-white.png' import { InputSection, SimulatorSection } from '../components/SimulatorSection'; import { MainApp } from '../styles/AppPage-styles'; import {logout, supabase} from '../services/supabaseClient' import { ProfileImg } from '../components/Profile'; import { SubmitButton } from '../components/Buttons'; import { useState } from 'react'; export function AppPage() { const User = supabase.auth.user() const user = { name: User?.user_metadata.full_name, avatar: User?.user_metadata.avatar_url, } const [minData, setMinData] = useState('') const [ destinyData, setDestinyData] = useState('') const [originData, setOriginData] = useState('') const [cellPhonePlanData, setCellPhonePlanData] = useState('') async function getDestiny() { const { data: SemFaleMais, error } = await supabase .from('Sem_FaleMais') .select('price') .match({'destiny': `${destinyData}`, 'origin':`${originData}`}) .single() let price = Object.values(SemFaleMais) price.map(({a, b})) console.log(price) } const minInput = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setMinData(e.target.value) } return ( <>
